channel.title: Detect if your flagged?
channel.description:
How do you detect if your flagged?
I put the code [code]if(flagged) System.out.println("You Are Flagged!");[/code] Under the login method and each time i log in it prints im flagged, am i really flagged or is my code just not doing what its suppose to be doing.

item.title: Detect if your flagged?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Refraises
MoparIsTheBest, it was awesome of you to release that updater. Not only can I attempt to learn more about Java by studying Aryan, but it will also get many people’s accounts banned causing loads of people to become discouraged and cease using Aryan as much…

Better, baby? x)

item.title: Detect if your flagged?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote="!!1one!eleven1!, post:10, topic:1522"]I ran aryan updater on my client files, everything got renamed

ok i just realised that in the aryan bot class that notifyflagged is actually commented out, if i uncomment it all and run it, it says im flagged. Am i really flagged or is it just stuffing up?[/quote]

thats what the aryan renamer does, it renames everything

and it is commented out because now everyone is flagged all the time, so whats the use of scaring the noobs?

Read full topic

item.title: Detect if your flagged?
item.dc:creator: @_1one_eleven1 !!1one!eleven1!
item.description:
@_1one_eleven1 wrote:

I ran aryan updater on my client files, everything got renamed

ok i just realised that in the aryan bot class that notifyflagged is actually commented out, if i uncomment it all and run it, it says im flagged. Am i really flagged or is it just stuffing up?

Read full topic

thats aryan:P, aryan renames the flagged variable

item.title: Detect if your flagged?
item.dc:creator: @_1one_eleven1 !!1one!eleven1!
item.description:
@_1one_eleven1 wrote:

Ollie:

the flagging system dosent use flagged as the varibable, its a seperte boolean, you will have to look it up or see how aryan refers to it

Mine is pretty much in the same place

flagged = aClass38_1120.method479() == 1;
...
...
if(flagged) Bot.notifyFlagged();

Instead of Bot.notify mine prints into the console.

Read full topic
